participant_1.background:

I write about my travels and experiences.
I try to take care of myself, but I don't spend a lot of time worrying about my appearance.

participant_2.background:

i drive a ford taurus.

content.text: Hey, I'm a little nervous about tomorrow's first day of safety patrol. I know it's a big responsibility, but I think I'm up for the challenge.

Hi there! My name is Sarah, and I'm a bartender. I'm not blind, but I do have diabetes. I've managed to manage my diabetes well enough to become a bartender, and I love my job. I'm also a vegetarian, and I'm concerned about my father's health.

That's really cool! I'm glad you're able to manage your diabetes and do your job well. I'm also glad you're a vegetarian. I'm a little worried about my cats getting too hot in the summer, but I'm sure I'll be able to figure something out.
Thanks! I'm glad I'm able to do both, too. I know it can be tough to be a vegetarian, but I think it's the right thing to do for the animals.
I agree. I love my cats, and I want them to be safe and comfortable.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be able to figure out something to keep them cool in the summer.
